page.title: 09SHOPPING IN EVERCREECH
page.content:
We did a survey and found that 37% of families at Evercreech Primary School go shopping in Evercreech.We found out that 53% of the children's mums go shopping out of the village.They go to Shepton Mallet.Some go as far as Yeovil or Street.In Evercreech there is one Hairdressers, two Grocers, one Vet's Surgery,one Newsagent,a Post Office,a Fruit Shop,a Chemist,one Fish and Chip shop and one Haberdashers.
POST OFFICE
The Post Office has been there for 49 years. Evercreech Post Office no longer has a sorting office.There used to be a weekly dentist upstairs. Letters go to Shepton Mallet for sorting.There are three collections each day.
